blocks.block_text: Besides these , a large number of articles , essays , stories , poems etc. written by her have been published since 1922 in various journals and magazines though not collected in book form . She is a pioneer as well as one of the formost among women writers in Bengali on the rights of women and their problems . She was and is a member of All India Women's Confernce , Calcutta Branch , since its inception and was a vice - president for several years .
